SUB_W08_WRLD_AMYA_START_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_WRLD_AMYA_START_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Wow, it's dark in here.
Am I in a cave or something?

SUB_W08_WRLD_AMYA_START_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_WRLD_AMYA_START_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I know cats like small, dark places,
but it's not gonna be easy finding
my missing kitty like this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Huh? What in the world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
That string is moving.
It's like...squirming?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Stay away from that worm, you!
It's mine!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Yikes! Who are you!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Don't recognize you, stranger.
Where are you from?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Oh my gosh, you totally SCARED me!
I can't believe you just popped up
out of the ground like that.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Well, I did. And now I want the worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: You mean the string? Sure, take it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: You sure? I mean, really sure? Worm this big is a pretty rare find.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
All yours! Thing doesn't look like
it has any magical power, anyway.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Yesss! Now I can finally go home!
You're good people, stranger. Take care.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Wait! I'm looking for a cat.
Have you seen one around here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Nope—but good luck all the same.
Bye now!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Wait!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: What is it this time?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Where am I? I thought I was in a cave,
but I don't see an exit anywhere and
I don't know how to get out.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Wait. You can't dig holes?
How have you LIVED, man!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text: Oh man, we ARE underground!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Well, of course we are! Mud and dirt,
but you are a strange creature. Fine, I'll take you to my house—
but then you're on your own. Capisce?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
Thank you very much!
Oh, and I'm Ameya the Witch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FIRST_CONTACT_000_CUT_.text:
I'm Tope, of the Kuld.
Also, what's a witch? Sounds tasty.

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Holy wow, I can't BELIEVE how fast
you dug that hole, Tope!

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
The trick is to look for spots
where the earth is soft.

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
So if you dig a tunnel every time you
need to go somewhere, does that mean
this place is full of 'em?

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Nope. Our tunnels eventually cave in
and fill up all on their own.

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Well, that sounds inconvenient.
Want me to keep them open with magic?

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Sure don't. See, when the earth is dug up and filled
in, it makes the soil more fertile. That fertile soil
goes on to nurture nutrient-rich worms, which all
of us Kuld then get to chow down on.

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text: Circle of life, huh? I get you.

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Yeah, I dunno about that.
All I know is that we couldn't get
by if we didn't do it this way.

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIGWALL11_010_CUT_000_.text:
Crummy thing is that worms have been real
hard to come by lately—but that's a tale
for another time. Now let's go home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Here's the colony where
we Kuld live.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: So this is where your friends are?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Dunno if I'd call 'em that; Kuld typically work alone, and we never form groups. We only meet up like this because it's a convenient way to keep everybody safe.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
C'mon, let's go to my house.
It's over there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Coste! I'm home!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Late again, Tope! Ground below, how long
does it take to catch one measly worm!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! I'm hungry!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: I know, honey. I know.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
See that? Your poor son is starving!
Now hand over the worms already.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Here you go, honeybunch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Are you KIDDING me!? This is it?
Well, that's just pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Sorry, sweetie, but you know how poor
the hunting's been lately, and—

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I don't want to hear your excuses!
How pathetic.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I thought you all acted on your own,
but you have a whole family!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: We work alone. That doesn't mean we don't have families.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh, a guest! Well, this is unusual.
Why didn't you tell me you were bringing
someone home, you grubhead!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Honey, this is Ameya.
She gave me the worm.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Ameya, this is my wife, Coste,
and my son, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Hiya!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry you had to see such a disgraceful
display, stranger. We don't have much,
but please make yourself at home.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: And as for you, Tope...

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Yes, sweetlips?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
You're an idiot if you think this single
worm is enough for us! Little Gourmand
here is a growing pup, you know!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Mommy! When's fooooood!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Of course, honey. I'll be right back.
Just hold on, all right, Son?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Oh hey, you did mention not being able
to find any worms recently, huh?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Yeah, it's like their population dried
up all of a sudden. And it's not just
worms—other creatures too.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text: Do you know what caused it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Nope, but I'm looking into it—because if
this continues, we're all gonna starve.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
THAT'S why you work so late every day!
You don't want your family to worry.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Yup. Last thing I want to do is cause Coste
any unnecessary stress. This is just a thing
where I have to carry my own water.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, guess it's back to investigating for
me. But, uh, what are you gonna do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Me? I'm coming with you! I mean,
I can probably find my cat a lot
easier if I stick with you, anyway.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Well, today I'm goin' farther than usual,
so we might end up runnin' into other species.
Sure you're ready for that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
Wait, so there are people besides
the Kuld living here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_000_CUT_00.text:
A few, yeah—though we don't usually
interact, so I can't tell you much more. This world's got a kind of code, see:
stick to your own, avoid unnecessary spats,
and you'll generally be golden.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
One of the Bashar might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Hey! Get outta here, you!
This is Kuld territory!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text: I'll wait and see what happens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text: Oh man, they took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Stop yelling, you silly mole!
What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Oh, Coste! What a relief!
Where were you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
We both got bored waiting for you
to come home, so we took a little
walk to kill some time.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
I'm sorry, honeypants, but it's not safe out
here right now. In fact, you should just stay
away from the colony altogether for a bit.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_00.text:
Don't need to tell me twice—just make
sure you come home with some good
worms this time. You hear me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Yes, thanks to you. Also, you're one
of the Kuld that live here, right?
Tope, I think?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
That's me, all right. But tell me,
have you seen a mole named Coste?
She's my wife.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Sure did! Said she was worried
and headed out to try and find you.
A real firecracker, that one!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Well, at least she's not here.
That's a relief.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
What about the Bashar who attacked you?
Do you know anything about him?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Npc
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_010_CUT_01.text:
Nope. All I know is they came
after me outta nowhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_00.text: One of the Naml might be at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_110_CUT_01.text:
What about the Naml who attacked you?
Know anything about him?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_00.text:
One of the Dufda might be
at our colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
You're not making this easy!
Whatever. Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_210_CUT_01.text:
What about the Dufda who attacked you?
Know anything about him?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text: That's the only colony left. The Lord of the Earth has to come here!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text: This is my house, and I will protect it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_00.text:
The ground is shaking...
It's coming!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text: It's not moving... Is it over?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
I think it's broken. But while we stopped
it from destroying the world, we couldn't
clear up the ground pollution. I'm sorry.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
No, it's better this way; I actually hate the
thought of relying on something called
the 'Lord of the Earth' to survive.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text: But what about that cat of yours?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Oh, it showed up when we took down
the Lord of the Earth! Neat, huh?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Well, I'm glad it all worked out for you.
As for us, I feel confident we'll take back our
wormy world without the help of some 'Lord.'

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Tope! Where in the WORLD
have you been!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Coste? Gourmand? I'm gonna do it.
I'M GONNA DOOOOO IT!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_01.text:
Oh for the love of dirt... Maybe stop all
this fool yelling and go get us some worms,
you good-for-nothing mole!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ERRORS REPAIRED. RESTARTING.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Does this thing EVER give up!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: ALL SYSTEMS GREEN. SOIL CONTAMINATION DETECTED. INITIATING CLEANUP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Huh? It left.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Yesss! We did it! The Lord of the Earth
is starting to clean the soil!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Then we did it?
We saved the world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
We sure did! Er, but I think my cat was
the one causing all the problems,
and I'm really sorry about that.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Hey, all's well that ends well,
as far as I'm concerned.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
I'm so glad I was with you, Tope!
Thanks for everything.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Ha ha ha ha! You SHOULD be glad!
Er, although I suppose you pulled
your weight as well. Take care now!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Coste! Gourmand! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
I'm bored of worms, Mommy!
I wanna eat something TASTY!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: WHAAAAAAT!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
...And that's why I need you
to take my son with you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
You're trusting me to babysit?
I mean, you barely even know me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
All children need to leave the burrow
sometime, and I know you'll take very
good care of our little Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
Yaaay! I can't wait to eat
all of the tasties!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
I'm not really leading a foodie tour here,
but on the other hand, the more, the merrier!
Come on, Gourmand! Let's go!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text:
We'll rest easy knowing our son is with you.
Now don't make any trouble, Son. All right?
You do everything she says.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Wife
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Have fun, Gourmand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.speaker: Mole_Son
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_070_CUT_02.text: Yaaaaaay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text:
So was that really the Lord of the Earth?
I mean, it could have just been one of the
carnivorous mushrooms the Naml use, right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text: I think you should be less concerned about what it is and happier that it's cleaning up the soil for you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_01.text: Well, even if it was cleaning it up, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about being eaten alive by some gigantic mushroom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Maybe? I mean, the Naml use those things even
though they know how dangerous they can be,
so maybe that's why they didn't want to see
the Lord of the Earth freed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Maybe the Naml were just waiting for a mighty
stranger like you to show up—but considering
you couldn't even dig through the earth without
my help, I think some gratitude is in order?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
I could've done it with magic, y'know!
But I have to admit, I had a lot of fun
traveling around with you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Ha ha ha! I did it!
I saved the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_080_CUT_02.text:
Sure, man. I'll let you have that.
Thanks for everything.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
This has to be some bad Dufda
joke that went a little too far.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text:
Oh no! We beat it, but wouldn't it be bad
if that actually WAS the Lord of the Earth?
That would mean you don't have a way
to clean the soil anymore!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_01.text: Well, even if it was cleaning up the earth, I don't want to live in a world where I'm worried about that thing swallowing me whole.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
It looks like it'll clean the soil for you,
and what's so terrible about that? I mean,
won't it just let you get more worms?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_MOLE_090_CUT_02.text:
Yeah, I suppose it might've actually
been the Lord of the Earth... You know what? I'm gonna say it was.
Heck, it renewed our soil, after all!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_000.text:
This is the origin of that
big quake earlier.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_000_010.text: I see something! Watch out, Tope!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_000.text: Is this the Lord of the Earth!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_040.text: UNABLE TO BOOT NORMALLY. SWITCHING TO START/STOP PROCESS.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_060.text:
Oh man, the Lord of the Earth is a MACHINE!
No idea where it came from, but I assume it's
some kind of soil-cleaning mech?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_070.text: ERROR. ERROR. ERROR. UNABLE TO EXECUTE START/STOP PROCESS. NORMAL OPERATIONS NOT GUARANTEED.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.speaker: Cultivator
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_010_080.text: TERRAFORMING PROCESS DEEMED A FAILURE. BEGINNING RESET OF WORLD ENVIRONMENT. ALERT. ALERT. THIS PROCESS IS DANGEROUS. OPERATORS MUST TAKE SHELTER IMMEDIATELY.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_030.text:
We need to stop this thing
before it destroys the world!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_000_CUT_020_050.text:
Some colony somewhere, I guess? I think it's
gonna try and take out the living creatures
and the soil, then make everything all over
again from scratch.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_000.text:
Wait, so THIS is the Lord of the Earth!?
Not very regal, in my humble opinion.
Also, it's supposed to clean up the soil?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_010.text:
There's something off about these bugs.
Their eyes are...dull.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_010_020.text:
Maybe they're still asleep.
Wake up, Mr. Lord!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_000.text:
I've got an awful feeling about this.
We should look around the colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_010.text:
Well, the Lord of the Earth's awake,
so it's probably fine. Plus, I need
to start looking for my cat, anyway.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_100_CUT_020_020.text:
Oh, right. I forgot that's the
whole reason you came here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_000.text: Is this the Lord of the Earth!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_010.text:
It definitely isn't listening
to anything we tell it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_020.text:
I don't think it's happy
about being woken up.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_010_030.text:
Next time I see those dumb frogs,
they're gonna PAY!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_010.text:
So after you take a really long nap,
what's the first thing you wanna do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_030.text:
So what does that thing even eat?
No way it fills itself up on worms.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_040.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FUNGUS_200_CUT_020_040.text:
Wait, so it wants to eat US!?
And it's gonna devour all the colonies!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I might not bet the house on it,
but it sure seems like it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Actually, I think it's just
going to a different colony.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_010_.text:
Well, at least we kept
this one safe for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_020_.text:
It's going to attack another colony.
We need to catch this thing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.text:
Is the Lord of the Earth going
to attack this place!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_030_.text:
I might not bet the house on it,
but it sure seems like it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_000_CUT_040_.text: We need to hurry after it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Is this 'cat' thing you're
looking for going to be here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Whoa! The ground's shaking!
...Er, do cats do that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BOSS_MOVE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I've seen some big kitties before,
but not THAT big!

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, I found a worm! It was hiding
in that mound of earth.

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_010.text:
Yeah, sometimes you find goodies when you dig
holes. At first you might think that something's
gotten in your way, but worms often hide out
in places like that, so I personally welcome it.

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_020.text:
So it's better to dig and see what
I get whenever I have the chance?

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_030.text:
Considering we found a worm already,
you may just be my lucky charm!

SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_GIMK_AMYA_DIRT13_010_CUT_000_040.text:
Tee hee. Your luck is safely in
the hands of Ameya the Witch!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: So what are they like, anyway?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Primitive and violent to the very last.
Nothing good ever comes of dealing with
them, but let's hope this ends up being
the exception that proves the rule. Anyway, there's gotta be a clue here,
so let's get to looking.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: Yeah, but we better sneak in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
The worms are gone.
The Creator is angry.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
We do not have enough offerings.
I will find an offering for the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
...'The Creator'?
Uh, there are gods in this world?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
No idea—but if I had to guess, I'd say
they thought one up for themselves.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
They are strong. So strong.
We cannot give them as offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
I will search for an offering.
I will search elsewhere.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
I don't think this is the end.
They said they were going to
look for offerings, remember?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_000_CUT_0.text:
Offerings... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: You return. What do you want?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about this, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth is dirty now.
The earth is bad.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The earth's life is the world's life.
It is hopeless.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: So there's nothing we can do!?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You're pretty chill considering
the world's about to end.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
We pray to the Creator.
We pray every day.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
I mean, sure—but there's gotta be
something REAL you can do, right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There is one way.
But it will anger the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Cool. Well, I don't care about your god,
so how about you just tell me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
No. The Creator hates the weak.
We must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Was that good enough for you?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
You are strong. The Creator likes you.
We can tell you now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: So what should we do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: Wake up the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth?
Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth eats foul dirt.
The Lord of the Earth makes clean dirt.
The Lord of the Earth serves the Creator.
The Lord of the Earth made the world with the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
The Lord of the Earth is asleep.
It has been sleeping long and long.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
So we just need to wake up the Lord of
the Earth and have it cleanse the soil?
Man, this is gonna be easy!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Yes. But it is dangerous.
The Lord of the Earth is violent.
The Lord of the Earth listens only to the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
It is bad to wake it up
of your own will.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: That doesn't scare us! Right, Tope?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Uh...s-sure! Of course not!
Ameya and I will take care
of this matter at once!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
So where is this thing, anyway?
I mean, I feel like I would've found
it by now if it was such a big deal.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
Remove the keystones. There are two.
This will wake the Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: And where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text:
There and there. One in each place.
They are big stones. With pictures.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_020_CUT_0.text: We got a plan! Let's go!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: So what are the Naml like?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
They are extremely prolific—by which
I mean there's a heck of a lot of 'em. They're not hostile, exactly, but they sure
ain't friendly either. I wouldn't be here if
I didn't have to be, so let's start looking
for clues.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: Yeah, but we better sneak in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
The colony's food reserves are low.
We must go harvesting.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
We are going to procure
some of them right now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
I found the perfect seedbeds
right here.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text: We cannot use them as seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
I don't think this is the end.
They said they were going to
look for seedbeds, remember?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_000_CUT_.text:
Seedbeds... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text: So what are the Dufda like?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Honestly, I don't know 'em very well—
rarely even seen 'em, in fact. All I
know is I wanna find a clue and get
out of here as quick as we can.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text: Yeah, but we better sneak in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Why don't we go to the toys?
We could play with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text:
Oooh, that could be fun.
But we need feed for the toys.
Let's go find some.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_00.text: Uh, do they mean the worms?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They came at us outta nowhere!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Buncha jerks! I mean,
I don't even taste good!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text: They are not good for feed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Boo! Killjoys! Boo!
Let's look somewhere else.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
I don't think this is the end.
They said they were going to
look for feed, remember?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_000_CUT_01.text:
Feed... Oh no! They're gonna
attack the other colonies!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
The Bashar are rounding up people they
kidnapped. What are they gonna do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text:
We've brought our offerings, O Creator!
Feast well! Feast well!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: What are the Bashar doing over there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: We were unable to gather offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_00.text: Then you will be our offering.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Gyaaa! Those people turned
into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text:
You saw our ceremony. This is bad.
We must kill everyone who saw.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_01.text: That Bashar turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
The Creator created this world.
The Creator gives us worms.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
But the Creator has been angry lately.
So we must give offerings.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Offerings? Those are just a bunch of
carnivorous mushrooms, you dirtbags!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Human_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text: Do not go against the Creator.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_000_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
The Naml are rounding up people they
kidnapped. What are they gonna do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
You will become seedbeds.
Seedbeds for our food.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text: What are the Naml doing over there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
Sadly, we met with an obstacle and
were unable to secure our seedbeds.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_00.text:
This responsibility lies with you.
You will be our seedbed.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Gyaaa! Those people turned
into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text:
You have learned the secret to our
food supply. This cannot stand.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_01.text: That Naml turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Securing our food. These mushrooms
create an infinite supply of seedbeds
from other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Insect_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms will allow us
to live forever.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text: You're sacrificing people!? What a sick joke!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_100_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
The Dufda are rounding up people they
kidnapped. What are they gonna do?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Hooray for all of you!
You get to be feed for our toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text: What are the Dufda doing over there?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_00.text:
Sorryyy! Stuff came up and
I couldn't bring anyone.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Gyaaa! Those people turned
into mushrooms!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
Actually, those are carnivorous mushrooms.
Looks like the mushrooms got them all.
There's no saving them now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text:
You saw our toys, didn't you?
We cannot allow this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_01.text: That Dufda turned into a mushroom!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
These mushrooms are our toys.
Aren't they cool?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_B
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
They turn regular people into mushroom
people. Isn't that awesome?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Stop playing with lives,
you pimply tadpoles!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Frog_A
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
That's manure and you know it!
This world is eat or be eaten!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Ugh! Shut up and get the heck
outta here already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
We still don't know why the
worms are disappearing.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_CORDYCEPS01_200_CUT_02.text:
Much as I hate to say it, we won't find the
answers we need among the Kuld; we have
to venture out and talk to other species.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
They don't seem to have a lot of interest
in chatting, either. You think the Bashar
are actually here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Bashar! What do you want, you scoundrel?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: An offering! An offering!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: He's being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: I'll wait and see what happens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: I have to save him!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Oh man, they took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: It'll be quick, I promise!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Foiled again. They are strong.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: Everything's okay now!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I did not ask for your help.
You did this without permission.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
Okay, super rude—but more importantly,
do you know anything about why no one
can find worms anymore?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_010_CUT_.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
This is the Naml colony. They're extremely
prolific—by which I mean there's a heck
of a lot of 'em. Not hostile, exactly,
but they sure ain't friendly either.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
They don't seem to have a lot of interest
in chatting, either. You think the Dufda
are actually here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Don't know—and don't really care what
happens to the Naml, if I'm honest.
But we need leads, so let's get in there.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
What does a Dufda want from this place?
Step any closer and you will pay!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Found feed! Found feed!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: What are you doing!? Stop!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: He's being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: I'll wait and see what happens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: I have to save him!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Oh man, they took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Are you here to attack us?
I will not hold back if you are.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Leave now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: It'll be quick, I promise!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Uuugh. Fiiine.
Forget this.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: Everything's okay now!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: How pitiful to be saved by a Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
That's how you act when someone saves
your hide? See if I help you again!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I didn't ask for your help!
You just went ahead and gave it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
Okay, super rude—but more importantly,
do you know anything about why no one
can find worms anymore?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text:
I have nothing to say to you.
Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_210_CUT_.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I told you, I have nothing to say.
Now begone from this place.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
There is no cause. The clean earth has
merely become sullied over the passing
of many, many years.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
That is what earth is. The coming end
of the earth's life span means the world's
end is upon us as well. This is our fate.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You're pretty chill considering
the world's about to end.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
We Naml have prepared for this situation by
building up our food stores for a long time.
Even if there are no more worms to capture,
we will endure.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Okay, but isn't there something
you can do to...y'know? Stop it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You are sharp. You are clever. Yes, there is a way—but it comes with
great risk. So instead of engaging with
that risk, we chose a more definitive way
of extending our life span.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So you don't care if everyone else dies
as long as the Naml are all right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Yet we are not the only ones doing so.
No, your words are not something
I care to hear from a selfish Kuld.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Look, it doesn't matter. Just tell
us what to do and we'll do it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Hey now, I never agreed to this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
But you're gonna do it anyway.
You have a family, remember?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: *grumble*

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
This is not something we can leave
to the weak. So before I tell you,
I must test your strength.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
That good enough, or do I need
to smack you around some more?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Well done. I suppose it is safe
to leave this in your hands.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Finally! So what's the plan?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
You must wake the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
In the beginning, this world was naught but
sullied soil. But the Lord of the Earth
purified the land, creating the chance for
life to blossom.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Once it was finished, it is said the
Lord of the Earth slipped into a
long slumber in a place unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So we wake this Lord of the Earth
and get it to clean the soil?
Sounds easy enough, I guess.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Even if you manage to rouse the Lord of the Earth,
it does not mean it will purify the earth as we
hope. Indeed, it may go beyond purification and
end up destroying the entire world.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Do you understand the risk that comes with
waking a being that has the power to remake
the world completely?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Hey, that's fair—but I still think this
is our only choice if we want to keep
the word in one piece. Right, Tope?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Uh...s-sure! Ameya and I will
take care of the matter at once!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
So where is this thing, anyway?
I mean, I feel like I would've found
it by now if it was such a big deal.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
I know not where it is, but legends claim the
Lord of the Earth is held in slumber by two
keystones of opposing powers. If you move
them, it might cause the Lord to awaken.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: So where are they?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text:
Each stone rests not far from this colony.
Look for enormous rocks carved with reliefs
of creatures unknown.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_INSECT_020_CUT_.text: Great, thanks. Let's go, Tope!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
You think the Bashar
are actually here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
Ew! Get out of here, Bashar!
You're gross!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: I'll wait and see what happens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: Oh man, they took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Bashar's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
We need to know why no one
can find worms anymore.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_010_CUT_01.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
This is the Dufda colony. Honestly,
I don't know 'em very well—rarely
ever seen 'em, in fact.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
You think the Naml
are actually here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: I'll wait and see what happens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: Oh man, they took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text:
You're one of the Naml's friends,
aren't you!? Go away! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_00.text: Nope. We just have a question.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
You saved me! Thank youuu!
So, uh, what did you need again?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
We need to know why no one
can find worms anymore.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text:
Hmm... I might know,
but I also might not!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_110_CUT_01.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We can't find any more worms, and we're
getting desperate. So if you know anything
about the cause, please tell us!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Nothing's causing it!
The soil is just dirty now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
It's the end of the earth's life,
which means it's the end of the world's
life—and you can't do much about that!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text: So we can't do anything to fix it?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
You're pretty chill considering
the world's about to end.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
We Dufda take the days as they come.
Now we'll just have fun until the end!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
C'mon, there has to be SOMETHING
you can do about this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Heh! You're funny, miss! And yeah,
there's a way—I just don't care!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
I don't care if you care.
Just tell me already!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_00.text:
Fiiine, I'll tell you...
AFTER you play with me!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Wee hee hee! What fun!
So fine, I'll tell you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
You have to wake up the
Lord of the Earth.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text: The Lord of the Earth? Who's that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Some weirdo who eats the dirty earth and
makes it all clean. I heard he cleaned the
whole world once back when it was all filthy.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
So we wake up this Lord of the Earth
and get it to clean the soil?
Sounds easy enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Yeah, except I don't think he's
really gonna listen to you.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
In fact, he'll probably get all mad
that you woke him and go hog wild!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Well, we'll just cross that bridge
when we get to it. Right, Tope?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Uh...s-sure! Ameya and I will
take care of the matter happily!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
So where is this thing, anyway?
I mean, I feel like I would've found
it by now if it was such a big deal.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
Dunno! Oh, but I hear it's snoozing 'cause
of two keystones with opposing powers?
So you probably wanna try moving those.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_FROG_020_CUT_01.text:
There's one in one place, and another in...
Ummmm... Some other place. They're big rocks
with carvings of weird creatures on 'em.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
You think the Naml
are actually here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
I have found a seedbed.
Time to secure it.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: He's being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: I'll wait and see what happens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: I have to save him!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Oh man, they took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: It'll be quick, I promise!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Insect
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
An interference.
We must retreat for now.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: Everything's okay now!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
I sure am! But more importantly,
do you know anything about why
no one can find worms anymore?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_110_CUT_0.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
That's the Bashar colony—a people primitive
and violent to the last. Nothing good ever
comes of dealing with them.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: You think the Dufda are actually here?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
No idea. But we need leads,
so let's sneak on in.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Stay out! Go away!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
I'm gonna make you feed
for my toys!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: No! Stop this!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: He's being attacked!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: I'll wait and see what happens.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: I have to save him!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Oh man, they took him away.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: We just have a question abou—

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Get out! Get out!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: It'll be quick, I promise!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Frog
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Ugh, stop bothering me!
Fiiine, I'll go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: Everything's okay now!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: You saved me! You are amazing!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
I sure am! But more importantly,
do you know anything about why
no one can find worms anymore?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We can't catch worms.
We are in trouble.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
Right, exactly. But do you know
anything MORE than that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Human
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text:
We are in trouble!
We are in trouble!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_BURROW_HUMAN_210_CUT_0.text: This is a waste of time. Let's go.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
This must be the keystone.
Let's move it!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_000.text:
Wait, look at the keystone!
The relief is moving!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Well, that was a surprise.
What WAS that?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Must've been a guardian or something.
I guess the Lord of the Earth is 
important enough to have one.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_1ST_000_CUT_010.text:
Okay, but you still need to help me move
the keystone. It is seriously heavy,
and I've got these stubby little arms.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_000.text:
I bet those reliefs are
gonna attack us again.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text:
We moved both keystones, so that should 
wake the Lord of the Earth, right?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.speaker: Mole
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_FOSSIL_2ND_000_CUT_010.text: Came from over there. Let's go!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Your stones. So many stones.
Will you give them to me?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Uh, you want my stones?
Sure, but they're nothing special.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Perhaps they are mere stones to you,
but they are necessities to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_000_CUT_0.text:
Ah, what fine stones! Please accept
this small token of my thanks.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text:
I mean, sure—but what are you
going to DO with them?

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_010_CUT_0.text: You will find out soon enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have collected more stones.
Give them to me.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text: So many... Perhaps this is enough.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
Aw, look! You took all the stones you
collected and made a nice little stack!

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
I have been exposed to the elements
this whole time, but now I can
finally rest in peace.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Mole_OldMan
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
You have been a great help to me.
But now, farewell.

SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W08_EVAR_AMYA_REWARD_STONE_020_CUT_0.text:
Guess we'll never know what
that was about.
